website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe watercraft cover that is designed for unparalleled durability and weather protection.
pros: Includes rear air vents that minimize wind lofting
Offers a convenient zippered access door on both sides
Boasts built-in strap keepers to ensure you can secure the cover to a watercraft quickly and easily
Sold with an integrated storage bag
cons: May be too small for some watercraft

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this after having used these jet ski covers for two months in coastal Delaware. They are even doing well during Tropical Storm Hermine. They have held up well in the wind and are doing a great job in protecting my two jet skis. The original jet ski covers finally bit the dust after 10 plus years and had not been waterproof for some time. The new covers are waterproof, but breathable and have kept the water out of the ski footwells. The elastic band at the bottom and the three cover straps have kept the covers firmly secured on the skis. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: New cover fits well and works.
customer_reviews.text: New cover fits well and works. Ours is a medium on a 95 Yamaha 2 seater. I would recommend buying one size larger than you think you need. The last one by this brand we had for 6 years before it tore in the sun and rain and trailering. I expect this will do the same, but I went to wal mart and bought a pool noodle for 94 cents, and put the ends over the handlebars to keep them from stressing the cover. That's where the old one finally ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hampl

customer_reviews.title: My Jet ski is 130" and this fit very nicely. It could over maybe another 6"
customer_reviews.text: I was buying covers at my local big box hardware store. $39 and I was lucky if they lasted one season. I ordered the Larger cover for a 3 place Sea Doo. My Jet ski is 130" and this fit very nicely. It could over maybe another 6". The materials seem much thicker and better constructed than the last cover. Nice that it has a 3 piece strap system as opposed to the 2 straps. Also, the straps are very long, which I like. I will update this after it has been thru one season.
customer_reviews.author: TOB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with the pwc covers I purchased. The fit and quality are great. For 1/3 the price of other covers I looked at, I couldn't be happier. They fit both of my jetskis ( Kawasaki 750 stx and 900stx ) Material is thick, has zippered access areas, and long straps for attachment. I recommend these covers.
customer_reviews.author: jason b

customer_reviews.title: Good value and decent fit with better design suggestion.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the medium size for '06 Seadoo GTX. Fits snugly but not too tight to stress the seams. Leave my ski moored and so far -3mos- it does good job of protecting from sun and misc debris or bird droppings. The only issue for me is with straps provided to secure the cover for traveling. The 3 straps are stitched on at one end with a plastic buckle at the other which means you can't detach them. They are a pain when trying to put the cover on while moored and serve no purpose. Plastic buckles on BOTH ends would have been more practical. Would have given it 5 stars for value otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Deepwoods

customer_reviews.title: They work for us
customer_reviews.text: They are actually a bit bigger than we expected. We ordered the large size for our Seadoo XPs and probably should have gotten the smaller size, but we just needed them to cover them at our home. We will not be using them for trailering. I don't think I would have kept them if we needed to use them for trailering. They are somewhat thin and even if they fit perfect, I don't feel like they would hold up to very much transporting, I could be wrong, it has happened before, shhh.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my Yamaha waverunner vx even though description said that it would fit up to 11 ft pwc. My advice (if you are a yamaha owner) is to buy the original oem cover on ebay. The price is not that much more than generic after market cover and the fit is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps'm clean.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as promised. Doesn't seem durable enough for expressway speed trailering, but since I live at the lake I don't have far to go. Straps and clips are easy to use. If you have stress points like mirrors you might want to put a towel over that area before covering the vessel. I've had a pontoon cover made by these guys for three years and it's holding up well so I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: clickchick

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this cover unless all you want to do is have your jet ski sit in your driveway. We bought it on June 18, It fits well and having the 3 straps was a good idea, I first thought. BUT we went on vacation on July 9 and drove to a lake. The cover came apart on the seams near the straps and some of the material wore away. So I went back on the website to return the item but we are one day late for the 30 day return policy. I am waiting to hear back from the consumer dept to see if they will take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy these covers.  Great value and built well.
customer_reviews.text: These covers are great for us on the ocean. They go on and off very easy. Durable and when it rained a few weeks ago here in SoCal, yes we actually got rain, the covers did great and even kept the water out of the footwells.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on my GP800's ( I bought two) so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on my GP800's ( I bought two) so far they are even water tight in heavy rain. Good quality for price..
customer_reviews.author: Carnut

customer_reviews.title: barely fits , runs small
customer_reviews.text: Meant to cover my 1999 gsx per description on ad..medium is supposed to fit but barely makes it around...these run small. I checked everywhere on cover and no where does it say medium so maybe they shipped a small? Picture to follow when it is not raining I will take photo.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fits GTI SE
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a 2018 GTI SE and were in a pinch for a cover. As much as we would love the Seadoo branded ones, paying $200+ for a cover seemed a little painful. Purchased the L for a 132.6" hull, and it fit's great and makes it easy to get it on, and most definitely has slack to spare. The straps are nice for the extra security, but are a real pain to get on an off while on a hoist. There is a decently tight bungee in the edges to help hold it secure, and the zip access at the front is great when you forget something in the dry box. Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Multiple problems after first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new jet ski. The fit was perfect. I like the two zippered areas for easy access to the gas tank, the multiple belts to keep it in place, and the elastic for a better fit. However, traveling with it proved to be a problem. In multiple areas it became destroyed. These are a few pictures where the material ripped, and seams came apart. Not sure if I received a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pinsel

customer_reviews.title: These are much sturdier than most
customer_reviews.text: These are much sturdier than most, I had bought a pair of different brand and they fell apart in less than 8 months, these I can tell right away are better by quality alone. Touch on the big side. I live in FL
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: For Seadoo GT130 medium size will not fit but.....large will
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Sizing did Not wrk well according to CA chart. Medium is supposed to fit hulls up to 133 in. My Hull was 131.5 and could not stretch it to fit. Had to return for a large.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne A Miles

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 130 in Seadoo
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my 130", 2006 Seadoo GTX 4-tec. Waste of my time when your description ensures me that it will fit up to 133 in ski! Seems very thin and easily ripped anyway oh, I will be buying something else more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R.

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for reasonable use.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Should last as a stationary cover. For those who expected this to be fine doing 60 mph on a highway, maybe be realistic about doing such things so you are not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kawasaki Ultra 150 stays dry!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover for my beloved kawaski ultra 150. The cover fits great and has an amazing feel to it. A huge pro is the elastic bottom which hugs the jet ski nice even without the straps across. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Straight from NYC|AJ B

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but glad I ordered the large
customer_reviews.text: just received and seems pretty good so far, though think the sizes are wrong. I took the advice of another reviewer and ordered the Large for my 10' 4" ( 124" ) jet ski. Glad I did, think the medium probably would have been too small, the large is a pretty tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Langham

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very durable and easy to use. Velcro straps are long enough to feed through the runners on our trailer, making it easier to cover without having to lift the watercraft. Fit our 9-ft 1996 Tiger Shark perfectly! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: I owned this cover for a year, the threads are coming out, zippers are stuck, cover turns white in certain areas in patches. Horrible for trailering. Time to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-holic

customer_reviews.title: The middle straps are a little too short to go under the trailer but the other strap works fine. There is elastic around it which helps keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 2002 Seadoo Bombardier very well. It also fits our 1999 Bombardier but a little looser. The middle straps are a little too short to go under the trailer but the other strap works fine. There is elastic around it which helps keep it secure. I wouldnt recommend this for trailering. We take ours off for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great WR Cover
customer_reviews.text: Buy It...best cover for the money. Just make sure to measure...this is for standard wave-runners, not extra long. Wish they made extra long version.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jet ski cover!
customer_reviews.text: It is such a great quality cover, I would buy it over and over again! It looks very good on our jet ski. I bought the larger size but it hugs the jet ski very nice! Every time I’m passing by it i have a huge smile - it was a great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover. Fit my Sea Doo 2008 Wake 155 ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. Nice cover. Fit my Sea Doo 2008 Wake 155 (gtx) perfectly and seems to be of high quality and waterproof. Doing just what I need, keep the sun and water off my jet ski. Would recommend, hence this voluntary review...
customer_reviews.author: meth ski

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: It fits well (little larger) but works good. The zippers in it need to be kept clean for easy of use.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Fit a 1999 Seadoo GTX almost perfect. Cover was a little big but sure is better then to small! Just ordered 2 more !
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Designed nicely
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised when I received the cover. It went on very easy and I like the design of the straps. Hopefully it holds up to the 4 year warranty. Fit my 1998 Yamaha Waverunner XL760 well.
customer_reviews.author: andrew j mascotti

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is the best deal going. Fits my Yamaha 3 seater like a custom cover.
customer_reviews.author: MDRSLK

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well on both of my 2017 Sea-Doo Sparks. I am so thankful that I did not spend the money on the Sea Doo Brand covers. These covers worked and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely made cover. Although not custom made, it fit my jet ski just fine. Has good straps that go under the ski so it doesn't blow off. Has survived several high winds already.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my time
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. It said the medium would fit a jet ski a.135" and my ski.is.126". It was a foot short. The material seemed a little thin. Make sure you order a size up. Anyway I reorder a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Works on a 2020 sea doo spark.
customer_reviews.text: Using it on my 2020 seadoo spark and its good enough for the girls I roll with. I don't drive with it on but I'm sure it can hold on if I did. Its a good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Nesto

customer_reviews.title: A Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely, covers were exactly as described and fit both my Sea-Doo and Yamaha jet skis. The features such as access to fuel and preventing "ballooning" while trailering are very useful. I'm pleased, as usual, by amazon and it's sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbes' Mother

customer_reviews.title: Much better than you’d expect at this price point!
customer_reviews.text: The medium fits my 127” Yamaha Waverunner nicely. I think 133” might be pushing it for a medium. If I had a pwc 130” or longer, I’d get the large. It’s got 3 tie downs that a very easy to work, and look to be durable. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2005 Sea-Doo. Went with the large and it fits nicely. Only drawback is if you keep you waverunner on a lift it is difficult to snap the straps that go underneath without jumping in. It's doing a great job in the heat this summer.
customer_reviews.author: BruceK.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my cover. I'm a little disappointed. Right off the bat i notice the color is way off from the picture they provide. The material feels cheap but thick. I like how the straps are integrated. But again it's not like the straps in the picture. Ill update my review once the cover has been tested against the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Watercraft Cover
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it had pockets for the steering handles Also, I cut the storage bag off, it got in the way of things. Other than those two, works ok. Will see how long it does last..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Syper

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my older skis to protect them for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fits good, will it last?  Hope so!
customer_reviews.text: In my long standing struggle to find a decent, moderately priced, cover for my 2006 Seadoo, this is looking great. The fit is perfect and installing, even on a lift, is pretty easy. So fit and appearance is good, now only time will tell about durability.
customer_reviews.author: WileyK

customer_reviews.title: ... Florida sun and it seems to be holding up pretty good. Hoping to get another 2 years out ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about 10 months now in the Florida sun and it seems to be holding up pretty good. Hoping to get another 2 years out of it. MUCH easier to take on and off than fitted covers!
customer_reviews.author: Dogman007

customer_reviews.title: If your pwc is 132 inches order large
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2018 seadoo gtr230. The description says the "medium" cover would fit it but that's not the case. My gtr is 132.6 inches long. The large just barely fits. But it fits it perfect. Nice sturdy material. Easy to put on. The storage bag is attached to the cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽 Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great! Looks very nice. The material is water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Brendainflorida

customer_reviews.title: Works so far -- just received it & it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so far -- just received it & it does fit. Surprised that it has a 4 year warranty (limited). So far others have not lasted that long.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one, for the other ski. This is a great cover!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: awesome cover so far
customer_reviews.text: awesome cover so far. very good quality compared to others I've purchased in past. would definitely buy this one again and recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Nock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, time will tell, last one from another company just shredded after one year or so
customer_reviews.author: chocko

customer_reviews.title: Mold prompt
customer_reviews.text: Cover developed mildew and it's basically garbage after one year .... Will contact seller as it is supposed to come with a 4 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Dann

customer_reviews.title: material is a little bit thinner but fit perfect on a seadoo gti
customer_reviews.text: material is a little bit thinner but fit perfect on a seadoo gti. purchased a sea doo cover about three years ago and it had breathing holes that caused mold to build up inside, and threw away. This is a good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed product at a good price. Love the 3 reinforcing straps, which prevent wind storms from blowing the cover off.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mysinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and the fabric is quite durable. Easy to put on, especially when compared to the original Sea-Doo covers.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Petito

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, fair price appear well made, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: T.A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far. Actually waterproof. Time will tell if the sun destroys it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Quill

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had the cover on the ski since last year. I was outside over the winter and has not faded or torn. For the price, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These fit Ski Doo RTX and GTX but do not travel well
customer_reviews.author: Scott Biggar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 05 Kawasaki STX-R great. Haven’t driven down the road with it but for storage it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have used it now for a while work very well
customer_reviews.author: kevan orourke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Yamaha and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Yamaha and very durable. I've had it for 2yrs now and is on my ski all year around as I dock it during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: John Machovina

customer_reviews.title: They good
customer_reviews.text: Is really good for the money and feels like they going to last the material feel good so I guess is really good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice, Durable
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well on my Yamaha XLT800, got a second for my XL700, fits well, not as snug, but still covers well from rain, doesn't blow off, have not tried trailering with them on yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice covers for the price😎👍
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice covers for the price. I have purchased two, and will be buying another three. I’ve not tried trailer in yet. Mainly easiest used for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: this is NOT Trailerable for long hauls...
customer_reviews.text: this is NOT Trailerable for long hauls... the material will rip apart after less than 10 hours on a freeway
customer_reviews.author: Nosh

customer_reviews.title: Fit our jet skis. Got them on just in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit our jet skis. Got them on just in time for winter. We will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it comes up well short on width for the wider decks of 3 seaters like the VX Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: While this cover has ample length at 140 inches for a Yamaha VX Cruiser, it comes up well short on width for the wider decks of 3 seaters like the VX Cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Lil from Lil

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price .If I can get 2 years out of it the cost is excellent..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is made from a very flimsy material. I didn't think it would hold up to the elements
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Stringham

customer_reviews.title: This is crap. Might as well have used a tarp
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This is crap. Might as well have used a tarp.

customer_reviews.title: very quality product
customer_reviews.text: These covers are used on two 1990's seadoo bombardier jetskis. They fit perfectly, are very durable, and travel well even at higher speeds (70mph) Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cove, r fit my Yamaha 1200 GP like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cove,r fit my Yamaha 1200 GP like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: George T Avery

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Tore from the wind the first time on the road.
customer_reviews.author: joe brocksmith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Seadoo GTIse 135
customer_reviews.text: Fits Seadoo GTIse 135 perfect. Better quality than expected. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Quality was better than I expected. Easy to install on the waverunner. Access zipper is helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Keep your jetski dry with this!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, seems durable enough. Probably won't tow with it on, but for storage I think it will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tschetter

customer_reviews.title: Held up during Hurricane Florence
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product. It has held up great so far. Easy to put on and held up during Hurricane Florence. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: David Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The fitment on my jet ski is loose. Also is not water resistant. I get a lot of water inside the cover
customer_reviews.author: Bpaige88

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY. 👎😡
customer_reviews.text: Cheap poor quality. I've used about 5 times and strap ripped out from base as the sewing gave loose. Maybe from wind?
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good durable material
customer_reviews.text: Good durable material. I dont feel like it protects it from the sun though. We will see in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I order 👌
customer_reviews.text: As expected 👌👌👌👌 nice color, good material and fit my Kawasaki 3 seater perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction.
customer_reviews.text: One trip across the state resulted in the back air vents being torn lose. Good idea, just poorly implemented. Amazon, as always, did great with the refund. If they made this better I would be willing to give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Good quality nice snug fit on my 2005 sea doo gtx.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 2015 Yamaha Wave-runner looks good too keeps dust and grime off the jetski when i’m not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Sidak

customer_reviews.title: Medium does not fit 2019 Yamaha VXR
customer_reviews.text: Too short and narrow for 2019 VXR. Appears to be good quality, have ordered the Large...

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect. I use a sea doo gti 130 2017. It’s a perfect fit and looks good and very reliable

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more or same amount for a quality one.
customer_reviews.text: Was really poor quality after 4 months falling apart . I actually need to replace already.

customer_reviews.title: its nice we don't have it tied down the the picture
customer_reviews.text: its nice we don't have it tied down the the picture. well see how it hold up. we just use it as a cover for our jet ski in the back yard.

customer_reviews.text: Great fit on new jet skis nice fabric keeps them clean we live in San Diego where it hardly rains but survived first winter storm.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. It is very durable and fits with no problem. Better than other cloth covers I've bought before.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have two and so far so good couple years in.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after one use
customer_reviews.text: I trailered the cover once and it already is coming apart. Not sure I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Good (not great) quality
customer_reviews.text: Good (not great) quality. Not really good enough to tow down the highway, worthy the cost. I use to protect a more expensive cover.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went on easily and fits well. I like the elastic bottom. Hopefully it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: VKelley

customer_reviews.title: Cover fits my SeaDoo wave runner perfectly. We will ...
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits my SeaDoo wave runner perfectly. We will see how it holds up in the sun over the next couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. But I wanted the dock lines and the ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good.But I wanted the dock lines and the bungee cord shipped all together ..But instead they separated them and it pissed me off .And charged more..Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine kruchun

customer_reviews.title: Off to a great start!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great! I have it on a 2003 SeaDoo GTI LE RFI which the spec says is 124 inches long. I bought the medium and it fits fine will a little room to spare. Based on the material I would not attempt to trailer it on the highway, it's not thick enough to withstand high speed wind. I can see why others had trouble with that aspect. I plan to use it only to block sun and rain while the SeaDoo is on the lift. I will update after the summer season with info on how well it did.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wave runner cover. This is higher quality material than I expected. Fits nice and is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Easy to put on either on the trailer for travel or when in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fairbrother

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 1998 Seadoo GTI like a glove. I ordered the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Stellex Personal Watercraft Cover, Trailerable Jet Ski Cover with Polyester Fade-Resistant Fabric (Blue)
product_meta.description: All-season travel cover with an integrated trailering system. Tough polyester Stellex fabric designed for durability and weather protection. Integrated trailering system with built-in quick adjusting side-release straps. Rear air vents reduce inside moisture and wind lofting. Zippered access door on both sides. Elastic cord in bottom hem provides a quick and secure fit. Tension panels tightly secure cover for highway travel. Built-in strap keepers secure excess strap after tightening. Integrated storage bag. 4 Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Medium fits watercraft up to 133 inches long
Integrated trailering system with built-in quick adjusting side-release straps
Tough polyester stellex fabric designed for durability and weather protection
Zippered access door on both sides
Rear air vents reduce inside moisture and wind lofting
